Is the result of a cross between an Asian Leopard Cat and a British domestic cat.
It is said that originally a cat breed that used to accompany the monks who settled in temples in Burma
A long-haired cat with a round face and a snub nose. Originally from Iran then imported to Italy.
The cat is a derivative of the Wichian Maat (Thai cat) with the characteristics of a long and slender body, oval face, wide ears, and bluish eyes.
Russian domestic cat with thick fur and large body but very agile and famous for its jumping ability.
Cherry Head turtles belonging to this type of omnivorous animal are able to consume everything from leaves, vegetables, fruits, worms, to insects.
Although classified as a land tortoise, it turns out that this type of exotic tortoise prefers habitats with humid conditions, for example near rivers.
As herbivores, the diet of the Leopard tortoise is generally in the form of leaves, vegetables, and fruits.
This type of tortoise has a characteristic yellow shell and has very hard characteristics. The Sulcata tortoise is also one of the largest land turtle species in the world
Not only appearance, this type of turtle also has an aggressive temperament and does not hesitate to bite if it feels threatened by the conditions around it.
The size of the Indian Star tortoise is also quite small, ranging from 17-30 centimeters. This species of tortoise is also able to live up to 80 years, with an average of 30-55 years as a pet.
Rabbit originating from the Netherlands weighing 1.1-2.5 pounds, the Dutch Dwarf is one of the smallest rabbit breeds
The rabbit Orictolagus cuniculus also called the European rabbit or the domestic rabbit is the only species in its genus
"Holland Lop rabbits are independent and playful rabbits "
"Is a type of domestic rabbit that is recognized by the American Rabbit Association "
"a very large breed of domestic rabbit, usually considered the largest breed of its species "
This rabbit has a large body, erect ears, and the characteristic that makes this Rex rabbit preferred is its carpet-like fur.
